messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

time cards issue re please action submit your cards for approval hello have issue with submitting for period here you can attached image mistake could you help with thank you regards android developer id image id image id image en date monday november please action submit your cards for approval dear you receiving because you have cards haven submitted for approval please note enough only enter your but also make you submit your for approval take corrective actions case your submitted card gets rejected below breakdown your submitted cards please submit for approval your accordingly possible country submitted cards card status entered total submitted cards submitted cards statuses explained error usually happens when you log calendar view for period longer than days then delete one entry causes timecard switch error fix you should add back for deleted or delete entire timecard using right hand side menu recreate again rejected card was rejected by one approvers please correct card entries accordingly resubmit entered status timecard when only one or few days entire timecard have entered saved cards status passed entered validation but gone next submission step for any card issues you can resolve please wait but raise corresponding incident through portal for resolutions
